entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
